description.narrative: The overall objective is to contribute to poverty reduction in Bangladesh by improving the quality of and increasing access to secondary education. Relevant and quality education will support the continued social and economic development of Bangladesh and expand employment opportunities for its population. The three major components: (i) increasing accountability and transparency in secondary education management, (ii) improving the quality of education, and (iii) improving equity of access to secondary education.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved efficiency, quality, and equity of access to education at the secondary level
